H0.text: where does a girl wear an engagement ring. Right Hand Ring Finger

H1.text: where does a girl wear an engagement ring. Left Hand Thumb

H2.text: where does a girl wear an engagement ring. Right Hand Index Finger

H3.text: where does a girl wear an engagement ring. left hand ring finger

A4.text: In the Anglosphere, the ring is customarily worn on the left hand ring finger, but customs vary across the world.

A5.text: In Poland and Turkey, the engagement ring and wedding band are traditionally worn on the right hand but modern practice varies considerably.

A6.text: In a traditional Jewish wedding ceremony, the wedding ring is placed on the bride's right-hand index finger.

A7.text: These rings may be worn on the ring finger of either the right or left hand by both men and women.
